Use a sunshade cap: A sunshade cap is a lightweight, portable sunshade that can be worn on your head to protect your skin from the sun.
Apply sunscreen to your scalp: Just like you would on your face, you can apply sunscreen to your scalp to protect it from the sun.
Wear a headband: A headband can provide shade to your scalp and can also protect your skin from the sun.
Use a hair cover: A hair cover is a lightweight, breathable fabric that can be worn on your head to protect your skin from the sun.
Wear a sunvisor: A sunvisor is a headband with a built-in sunshade that can be worn on your head to protect your skin from the sun.
